titles.title: A bill for the relief of John H. Teele.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 4/21/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a named individual a specified sum in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from erroneous advice given him by the Department of the Army.
